plenxxx.AutoPowerOff: Set auto power-off time of PLEN:xxx. 30 minutes is default.
plenxxx.Information: Check the Motion Data information from EEPROM.
plenxxx.LedEye: Switch the led eye of PLEN:xxx.
plenxxx.LoadServoInit: Load the servo initial position from the EEPROM.
plenxxx.ResetInitPosition: Delete the servo initial position from the EEPROM.
plenxxx.SaveInitPosition: Save the servo initial position to the EEPROM.
plenxxx.ServoInitialSet: Set Servo Motors to initial Position.
plenxxx.ServoMove: Move Servo Motors to set degree.
plenxxx.ServoWrite: Controll the each servo motors. The servo will move max speed.
plenxxx.danceMotion: Play the Dance Motion on PLEN:xxx.
plenxxx.motion:
Play the Motion on PLEN:xxx.
You can check the list of Motion Number at GitHub.
plenxxx.servoNumberPicker: Get the servo number field editor
plenxxx.servofreeNumberPicker: Get the servo number field editor
plenxxx.stdMotion: Play the Standard Motion on PLEN:xxx.
plenxxx.walkMotion: Play the Walk Motion on PLEN:xxx.
